column2: A method that overrides a method in a superclass but does not have an 'Override' annotation cannot take advantage of compiler checks, and makes code less readable.
column4: This method overrides [["BinaryEncoder.encode"|"relative:///src/java/org/apache/commons/codec/BinaryEncoder.java:40:12:40:17"]]; it is advisable to add an Override annotation.

column1: Result of multiplication cast to wider type
column2: Casting the result of a multiplication to a wider type instead of casting before the multiplication may cause overflow.
column4: Potential overflow in [["int multiplication"|"relative:///src/java/org/apache/commons/codec/binary/Base64.java:754:21:754:37"]] before it is converted to long by use in an assignment context.

column2: Overloaded methods that have the same number of parameters, where each pair of corresponding parameter types is convertible by casting or autoboxing, may be confusing.
column4: Method BinaryDecoder.decode(..) could be confused with overloaded method [["Decoder.decode"|"relative:///src/java/org/apache/commons/codec/Decoder.java:53:12:53:17"]], since dispatch depends on static types.
